mapper.select: SELECT freeboard_id, user_id, freeboard_title, freeboard_content, freeboard_click, freeboard_image, freeboard_represent_image, freeboard_created_at, freeboard_deleted_yn FROM freeboard WHERE freeboard_deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY freeboard_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT freeboard_id, user_id, freeboard_title, freeboard_content, freeboard_click, freeboard_image, freeboard_represent_image, freeboard_created_at, freeboard_deleted_yn FROM freeboard WHERE freeboard_id = #{id} AND freeboard_deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard ( user_id, freeboard_title, freeboard_content, freeboard_click, freeboard_image, freeboard_represent_image, freeboard_created_at, freeboard_deleted_yn ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent}, 0, #{freeboardImage}, #{freeboardRepresentImage}, NOW(), 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard SET freeboard_title = #{freeboardTitle}, freeboard_content = #{freeboardContent}, freeboard_image = #{freeboardImage}, freeboard_represent_image = #{freeboardRepresentImage} WHERE freeboard_id = #{freeboardId} AND freeboard_deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeboard WHERE freeboard_deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE freeboard_id = #{freeboardId} AND like_count > 0
